metadata.description: All his life, Peter Parker has been plagued by money problems...and today, it gets worse. When Spider-Man and the Black Cat stop a magician from robbing a bank, everything goes horrifically wrong--or incredibly right, if you ask the Black Cat. Because against his will, Spider-Man just became a multi-multi-multi-millionaire. Could this be the end of Spider-Man's money problems? Nope.
metadata.name: Spider-Man: The Root Of All Annoyance
